meanings.def: an unusual or unpleasant event is not likely to happen in the same place or to the same people twice
after an unpleasant experience you are careful to avoid something similar

examples: I don't know her well, I've only met her once or twice.

meanings.def: to think carefully before deciding to do something
examples: You should think twice about employing someone you've never met.
There was enough of the drug in her stomach to kill her twice over.
